Docs.summary: Methods to probe for SIMD support.
Docs.remarks: Helper methods used to probe for features in the SIMD runtime.

Docs.summary: The acceleration mode supported in this system.
Docs.remarks: This value returns the acceleration mode supported in the current configuration. The value is AccelMode.None on systems without SIMD support or runtimes without SIMD support (like .NET) .

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool IsMethodAccelerated (Type type, string method);

Docs.param: The type to lookup, a Type from Mono.Simd.
Docs.summary: Returns true if the specified method is accelerated on this platform.
Docs.returns: True if the method is acceelrated.
Docs.remarks: The method name must be the full name, for example the C# operator + is actually encoded as op_Addition. You must use the underlying name for this lookup.
